Good action game but too many kids thinking this is life and avoid you from having fun.

While I have not recently played, the game has provided numerous hours of entertainment.
I have focused my time in this game towards the competitive mode, this review is geared towards that.

Pros:
- Fun to play with a team of friends
- Lot of tactics, strategies to learn and use against your opponents
- Great way to meet new friends to play with.

Cons:
- Can become a frustrating game playing alongside toxic players
- It may take a while to really understand how to consistently win each match
- Matches can take a while, so there is a level of dedication needed each time you play competitive.

Overall, there are a lot of satisfying and fun moments you can have with this game. The frustration mainly comes from the toxicity of the players.
THE BEST GAME I'VE EVER PLAYED.

This game is full of cheaters. I don't recommend you to waste your time with dealing with cheater bots. After the game became free, the rate of the cheaters increased. The thing is that this game has almost no substitute. This makes me want to play even though I'm totally sure not encountering a cheater on a competitive is a pretty rare thing. I don't consider to play this game anymore until VAC decides to do its job.

Old but gold. This game is receiving constant love from its devs, skins are cool but trading is kinda risky to get into. You should probably just download it and give it a try now that its free, it even has a duos only battle royale. Ranked is okay I guess, but I don't take it very seriously since I'm only silver elite.
虽然我很菜，但是去打排位和休闲也都能找到旗鼓相当的对手，不用担心被虐的很惨，如果要提升技术的话有很多要练习的地方，如果休闲的话偶尔玩一两盘也很开心！

if you want to tryhard and cry this is the game for you

People are always coming to me. “Michael, I have a secret. Your the only one I trust.” No thanks, because keeping a secret can only lead to trouble. Like I was watching Cinemax last weekend. This movie, Portrait of a… Prostitute something. Secrets of a Call… More Secrets of a Call Girl. And the lead character, Shila, is framed for murder. She goes on the run and winds up working at a bordello in Malibu. I don’t, I don’t want to live like that. I like it here. I don’t want to be Shila, I like being Michael Scott.
Uhhh, is pretty good i guess.
